dev-1.x.name: drupal/global_avatar

security-coverage.message: Dev releases are not covered by Drupal security advisories.

dev-1.x.description: Allows users to set a global avatar in multisite environments where the user table is shared. Avatars can be uploaded from any site and are stored in a global location specified by the administrator. The module must be enabled on all sites that share the user table.

1.0.0.name: drupal/global_avatar

security-coverage.message: Covered by Drupal's security advisory policy

1.0.0.description: Allows users to set a global avatar in multisite environments where the user table is shared. Avatars can be uploaded from any site and are stored in a global location specified by the administrator. The module must be enabled on all sites that share the user table.
